item.title: Software Sustainability Institute Fellowship 2020
item.description: So 2020 is off to an incredibly exciting start! I have been awarded a Software Sustainability Institute 2020 Fellowship!!! 🎉 🎉 🎉 We are thrilled to announce the new cohort of @SoftwareSaved Fellows for 2020! You can find out more about the new cohort here: https://t.co/WPTePa3hoP Congratulations to the SSI Fellows 2020! #SSIFellows2020 #BetterSoftwareBetterResearch pic.twitter.com/zX21yvZo3h — The Software Sustainability Institute (@SoftwareSaved) January 10, 2020 The Software Sustainability Institute (SSI) is an organisation that facilitates the advancement of software in research by cultivating better, more sustainable, research software to enable world-class research (“Better software, better research”).
